testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.title: What our clients are sharing.
testimonials.subtitle: Discover the glowing feedback from our delighted customers worldwide.

review1.name: Sarah & David
review1.review: Wedinex saved us so much time! We had 300 guests and tracking RSVPs was a nightmare before. The WhatsApp integration is genius - everyone responded within days.

review2.name: Rachel Cohen
review2.review: As a mom helping plan my daughter's wedding, I was worried about the technology. But Wedinex is so easy to use. Even my husband figured it out!

review3.name: Michael & Noa
review3.review: The automatic reminders feature is amazing. We didn't have to chase anyone - the system did it for us. Highly recommend for busy couples.

review4.name: Yael Levi
review4.review: I recommend Wedinex to all my clients now. It's professional, reliable, and makes my job so much easier. The reporting features are excellent.

review5.name: Daniel & Maya
review5.review: We loved being able to customize our RSVP page to match our wedding theme. The preview feature helped us get it perfect before sending.

review6.name: Amit Shapira
review6.review: Couples who use Wedinex always have accurate guest counts. The export feature makes our catering planning seamless. Great product!

review7.name: Shira & Oren
review7.review: Managing RSVPs for our wedding of 400 guests was effortless with Wedinex. The SMS feature was perfect for reaching our grandparents.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive FAQ to find quick answers to common inquiries. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us for personalized help.

item1.question: How does Wedinex work?
item1.answer: Simply upload your guest list, customize your invitation message, and send via WhatsApp or SMS. Guests click a personalized link to RSVP, and you track responses in real-time on your dashboard.

item2.question: Is the Starter plan really free?
item2.answer: Yes! The Starter plan is completely free and includes up to 100 guests, WhatsApp & SMS invitations, and basic RSVP tracking. Perfect for intimate celebrations.

item3.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
item3.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade from Starter to Pro or Business at any time. Your existing data and guest responses will be preserved.

item4.question: How are WhatsApp messages sent?
item4.answer: We use the official WhatsApp Business API to send your invitations. Messages are delivered instantly and appear as regular WhatsApp messages to your guests.

item5.question: What happens if a guest doesn't have WhatsApp?
item5.answer: No problem! You can send SMS invitations to guests who don't use WhatsApp. Our system lets you choose the best channel for each guest.

item6.question: Is my guest data secure?
item6.answer: Yes, we take security seriously. All data is encrypted, stored securely, and never shared with third parties. We're fully GDPR compliant.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.q1: How does Wedinex help manage wedding RSVPs?
faqs.a1: Wedinex provides a complete RSVP management system. You can import your guest list from Excel, send digital invitations via WhatsApp, SMS, or email, and track responses in real-time on your dashboard. Guests can easily confirm or decline through interactive WhatsApp buttons or a personalized RSVP page.
faqs.q2: How do I send invitations to my guests?
faqs.a2: You can send invitations through multiple channels: WhatsApp (most popular in Israel), SMS, or email. Simply upload your guest list, customize your invitation design using our AI-powered invitation generator, and send to all guests with one click. You can also send personalized messages to individual guests.
faqs.q3: What is the Voice AI Agent feature?
faqs.a3: Our Voice AI Agent can automatically call guests who haven't responded to collect their RSVP. The AI speaks naturally in Hebrew or English, confirms attendance, asks about the number of guests, and updates your dashboard in real-time. It's like having a personal assistant making calls for you 24/7.
faqs.q4: Can I manage my seating arrangements?
faqs.a4: Yes! Our interactive seating planner lets you create table layouts with drag-and-drop functionality. You can arrange round, rectangular, or square tables, assign guests to specific seats, and visualize your entire venue layout. Changes are saved automatically.
faqs.q5: How does the gift payment feature work?
faqs.a5: Wedinex integrates with Meshulam to allow guests to send monetary gifts securely. Each guest receives a personalized gift link where they can contribute. You can track all gifts in your dashboard and send thank-you messages automatically.
faqs.a6: Absolutely! Wedinex is built specifically for the Israeli market with full Hebrew support. The entire platform, including guest-facing RSVP pages and invitations, supports both Hebrew (RTL) and English. Your guests can interact in their preferred language.
faqs.q7: Can I track suppliers and wedding tasks?
faqs.a7: Yes, Wedinex includes a supplier management system to track vendors, contracts, and payments, plus a Kanban-style task board to manage your wedding to-do list. Stay organized from engagement to the big day!
faqs.q8: What happens to my data after the wedding?
faqs.a8: Your event data is securely archived after your wedding date. You can access your guest list, RSVP history, and other details anytime. We never delete your memories - they're stored safely for you to revisit whenever you want.

security.title: Privacy & Security First
security.description: Your guest information is protected with industry-standard security. We never share or sell your data.

howItWorks.messageText: Send personalized wedding invitations via WhatsApp, SMS, or Email.
